name: LA URSA
description: Ursa, known as La ursa, is a popular manifestation of the carnival in Pernambuco, the place I speak of, being widely used at that time by young people who leave their neighborhoods accompanied by a tour made with buckets, bottles and singing. This fantasy is a being understood as fierce, but partly domesticated by a tamer, but who can become enraged. This figure has his own music that packs his dance: "A la ursa wants money who doesn't give is a pirangueiro" with the intention of raising money for his own group.  "PIRANGUEIRO" means people who are miserly
